newsitem.title: BELGIUM: Belgian police seize paedophile porn video tapes.
newsitem.headline: Belgian police seize paedophile porn video tapes.

text.p: Belgian police have seized video tapes containing pornographic material, some of it involving children, a Brussels court spokesman said on Wednesday.
"Quite a few cassettes have been seized...some of which are paedophile pornography," spokesman Philippe Van Hecke told Reuters.
Bernard Van Jansbergt, head of the Belgian Vice Squad, later told Reuters seven peodophile porn, sado-masochism tapes had been seized from one address in Verviers in eastern Belgium.
At the end of one of these tapes a child is shown strapped motionless to a chair.

"We cannot tell if the child is drugged, asleep or dead. It is impossible. No murder is shown," Van Jansbergt said, adding that at least five different European children were in the films and at least two adults. "There are sexual acts. Sodomy and fellatio," he said.
Van Jansberg stressed that there was no connection with the tapes, seized in November and January, and the case of child abduction, abuse and murder involving convicted rapist Marc Dutroux.
